name: Hacking with Benefits
description:
IARC - 18+ ADULTS ONLY
This is a CASUAL action game where you use your reflexes to collect the hearts.
The girls had their pics stolen and it's too dangerous to leave them on the wrong hands... Only you can recover them!
- YOU ONLY NEED THE MOUSE TO PLAY
- 10 UNIQUE WAIFU GIRLS TO HELP AND MAKE HAPPY
- A LOT OF REPLAY TO GET A FULL DOWNLOADED PIC
- 30 ACHIEVEMENTS TO GET
